name: PDF secure
author: ViitorCloud

sections.description:
Free plugin which provides functionality to disable download button and disable print button from custom html5lightbox.

Plugin Functionality:

Plugin will disables the download and print button from custom html5lightbox .

Get Involved

ViitorCloud believes in an active community support so with such plugins we try to make life easy for developers & of course customers. Don’t forget to subscribe our newsletter.
sections.installation:
1) Upload PDF secure plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2) Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Plugin Supports:

=> This plugin includes a functionality to disable download button and disable print button from custom html5lightbox. No need any seetings from backend or file editing.
